name: In Sight
description:
In Sight is my first attempt at a Choose Your Own Adventure novel. It's only in it's early stages, but I am posting it as I go so it can be experienced by those excited to play through it, and so that I have even more reason to be responsible and work on it in a timely manner, since it's just a little at-home project.

It's some parts sci-fi, mostly fantasy.

I can't tell you much more than that at this time, though.
